entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming south 20 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain or snow and ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
